name: Up To Speed: Pre-Alpha
description:
• Up To Speed: Pre-Alpha is an anti-gravity rogue-lite racer ✨
  • Combines futuristic arcade racing with rogue-lite progression 🌆
  • Upgrade your vehicle and race against powerful opponents 🏁
  • Defy gravity with increasingly exciting tracks 🛣️
Please download the demo below 🥺  Comment what you like and dislike 💬 We'll improve the game for you 💹
